private.title: Private Flights
private.description: Enjoy an exclusive and tailor-made service with our private flights. Monacair offers you a luxurious, fast and comfortable travel experience, adapted to your needs. Reach your destination with complete peace of mind, with premium service and total flexibility

pano.title: Panoramic Flights
pano.description: Treat yourself to an unforgettable experience by flying over the breathtaking landscapes of the French Riviera and Monaco. Our panoramic flights allow you to admire breathtaking views from the sky, in the comfort and elegance of our helicopters. A unique moment to experience or give as a gift!

regular.title: Regular Line
regular.description: Travel quickly and comfortably thanks to our regular lines. Monacair guarantees you frequent, punctual and elegant connections, notably between Monaco and Nice airport in just 7 minutes. Enjoy a premium service for a stress-free journey and peaceful arrival

jet.title: Private Jet
jet.description: Travel without limits with our tailor-made private jet service. Monacair offers you an exclusive experience, combining luxury, comfort and total flexibility. Take off at the time of your choice and reach any destination in the world with unmatched discretion and efficiency

sport.title: Lifestyle
sport.subtitle: Join the biggest events with an express private flight

gastronomie.title: Gastronomy
gastronomie.subtitle: Land at the doors of the most prestigious restaurants

culture.subtitle: Travel to the heart of the most beautiful cultural destinations by helicopter

description.title: Total flexibility for yourJOURNEYS
description.subtitle: Our helicopter charter services are designed to offer total flexibility. You choose your departure location, departure time, and flight destination. We take care of the rest

item1.title: Quick access to destinations
item1.description: Whether for an event, business meeting or vacation, we allow you to save precious time by avoiding traffic jams and long waits at traditional airports

item2.title: Personalized flights
item2.description: You can choose to depart from one of our bases and fly directly to your preferred destination, whether on the French Riviera, in the Alps, or any other destination on request

item3.title: Exclusive flights for a luxury experience
item3.description: Whether you're on a business trip or looking for a unique luxury experience, our private helicopters offer you exceptional views and optimal comfort. You can also organize tailor-made flights for special events, getaways or leisure activities on the French Riviera or in the Alps

bases.title: Departures from several PRESTIGIOUS bases
bases.description: Monacair offers you an exclusive helicopter charter experience to travel quickly and comfortably on the French Riviera, the Alps and beyond. Enjoy a tailor-made service with departures from our numerous bases, including Saint-Tropez, Monaco, Cannes, Courchevel, Geneva, Nice, and many others

AttractSection.title: Your Journey Starts Here

our-history.foundation: Monacair was founded in 1988 by Stefano Casiraghi.
our-history.services-intro: Monacair offers a wide range of services in the helicopter field:

services-list.management: Helicopter management, including consulting, accommodation, pilots, refueling and maintenance.
services-list.charter: Private charter flights to all destinations.

our-history.official-provider: Since 1999, the company has been Official Supplier to H.S.H. the Sovereign Prince of Monaco, Albert II.
our-history.regular-service: On January 1, 2016, the Monegasque Government designated Monacair as the sole operator of the regular transfer service between Nice Côte d'Azur Airport and Monaco.

monacair-leader.title: Monacair, the leading helicopter airline in France
monacair-leader.operational-bases: Monacair has several operational bases that allow it to offer exceptional services to its passengers: Monaco - Cannes, in Annecy to serve the French and Swiss Alps, and Grimaud, in the immediate vicinity of Saint-Tropez, for private and regular flights dedicated to tourists and business travelers to all destinations on the French Riviera, Provence, Corsica and Italy.
monacair-leader.team-goal: The entire MONACAIR team has one objective: deliver high-quality service, regardless of the moment of the journey.
monacair-leader.services: The MONACAIR Group has deployed a range of services to facilitate the daily life of its clients, ranging from simple transfers between two destinations to pilot training.
monacair-leader.maintenance: This quality of service is made possible by the reliability of the helicopters, whose maintenance and upkeep are managed internally in the workshops of its subsidiary Rotor Team.
monacair-leader.modern-fleet: It is by operating the latest generation aircraft whose comfort and materials rival the most modern that MONACAIR has been able to build customer loyalty among a demanding clientele.
monacair-leader.trust: Luxury-level service, exceptional responsiveness and highly secure flights have enabled Monacair and its subsidiaries Heli Sécurité and Rotor Team to gain and maintain the trust of their clients. This trust and loyalty are the keys to Héli Sécurité's sustainability.

our-services.title: Our Services
our-services.regular-line: Since January 2016, Monacair has been the official and unique Monegasque operator of the Regular Line between Monaco and Nice Côte d'Azur International Airport.
our-services.daily-flights: The company operates more than 40 daily flights, scheduled every 15 minutes. Based at Monaco Heliport and in all terminals of Nice Côte d'Azur Airport.

services-list.passenger: Passenger handling, including boarding/disembarking and baggage management.
services-list.crew: Handling of non-based private helicopter crews.

our-services.fleet: In September 2015, shortly after Monacair won the tender from the Monegasque Government, an order for six brand new single-engine H130 helicopters, equipped with enlarged luggage compartments, was placed. Delivery was received between December 2015 and the end of April 2016. These helicopters are air-conditioned and are mainly used for regular line transfers: Monaco-Nice and Nice-Monaco.

alliance.title: MONACAIR ALLIANCE
alliance.subtitle: 3 renowned companies for a unique service.

description.intro: The Heli Securite Blade Monacair alliance offers you a tailor-made flight experience, combining flexibility, comfort and safety.
description.destinations: Fly aboard one of our high-performance, latest-generation helicopters for a transfer to or from all French, Corsican, Italian, Swiss airports but also to all your winter destinations.
description.alps: Head to the Alps and its snow-capped peaks. Put on your skis and enjoy the most beautiful ski slopes in the world, enjoy outdoor activities, discover the rich culture & gastronomy of the Alps.

page.title: Our Fleet
page.subtitle: Discover our fleet of modern, comfortable and secure helicopters for all your travels.

intro.title: Excellence and Safety
intro.description: Monacair has a modern fleet of helicopters, regularly maintained and updated to guarantee your safety and comfort. Our aircraft are piloted by experienced professionals and meet the strictest safety standards.

safety.title: Maximum Safety
safety.description: All our aircraft undergo rigorous and regular inspections to guarantee optimal safety.

comfort.title: Premium Comfort
comfort.description: Our helicopters are equipped to offer you a comfortable and pleasant flight experience.

technology.title: Cutting-edge Technology
technology.description: Our fleet integrates the latest technological advances for safer and quieter flights.

helicopter.description: A modern and high-performance helicopter offering exceptional comfort and reliability. Ideal for all your travel needs with first-class safety and comfort features.

h130.title: Airbus H130
h130.description: The Airbus H130 (formerly Eurocopter EC130) is a light single-engine helicopter that offers exceptional comfort and panoramic views for all passengers. Ideal for transfers and panoramic flights, it combines performance, safety and elegance.

h125.title: Airbus H125
h125.description: The Airbus H125 (formerly Eurocopter AS350) is recognized for its versatility and exceptional performance. This light single-engine helicopter offers great reliability and adapts perfectly to all types of missions, from VIP transfers to panoramic flights.

h145.title: Airbus H145
h145.description: The Airbus H145 represents the pinnacle of luxury and technology. This twin-engine helicopter offers generous cabin space and exceptional comfort. Ideal for VIP flights and long-distance transfers, it guarantees a quiet and refined flight experience.

page.title: Experiences
page.subtitle: Discover Monaco and the French Riviera through exclusive and unforgettable experiences

first.title: Starred Dinner in Monaco
first.description: Experience an exceptional culinary experience in one of Monaco's most prestigious starred restaurants. After a panoramic helicopter flight, you will be welcomed for a gastronomic dinner prepared by a world-renowned chef.

second.title: Cooking Class with a Starred Chef
second.description: Learn the secrets of Mediterranean cuisine during a private class with a starred chef. You will discover professional techniques and prepare a gastronomic meal that you will then enjoy.
second.imageAlt: Cooking class with a starred chef

third.title: Wine Tasting in Provence
third.description: Discover the vineyards of Provence by helicopter. You will visit prestigious estates and participate in exclusive tastings guided by expert sommeliers.

Reservation.contactInfo: For more information or to make a personalized reservation, contact us by phone at +377 97 97 39 00 or by email at booking@monacair.mc.

testimonials.title: What our clients say
testimonials.subtitle: Discover testimonials from our clients who have experienced our gastronomic experiences

items.quote: An unforgettable gastronomic experience! The starred dinner in Monaco was exceptional, and the helicopter flight added a magical touch to this evening.
items.name: Sophie L.

items.quote: The cooking class with the starred chef was fantastic. I learned techniques that I now use at home. An enriching and delicious experience!
items.name: Jean-Pierre M.

items.quote: The wine tasting in Provence was an exceptional experience. Flying over the vineyards by helicopter then tasting exceptional wines was perfect!
items.name: Amélie D.

travelWith.description: Book your private jet with Monacair and discover the luxury of tailor-made air transport. Whether for a prestigious event or a private trip, we offer you an exclusive and personalized service.

about.title: About Monacair
about.description: Monacair is the leader in private helicopter and jet services on the French Riviera. We are committed to offering our clients luxury transport experiences, with particular attention to safety, discretion and comfort. Thanks to a modern fleet and impeccable service, each flight becomes an unforgettable moment.

travelWith.cta_text: Book your private flight today and experience an exceptional journey with Monacair.

hero.title: MONACAIR Management Service
hero.subtitle: The management service offered by MONACAIR has been designed to offer you total expertise, to save you time, money and spare you hassles.
hero.description: Thanks to this service, you enjoy an optimal and enriching experience with your helicopter, maintained according to the strictest standards. MONACAIR handles all administrative and operational aspects related to helicopter ownership, allowing you to fully enjoy your asset with complete freedom and flexibility.
hero.trustDescription: Thanks to its neutral management, rigorous financial control and scrupulous respect for aircraft safety and maintenance standards, MONACAIR ensures you complete peace of mind.

costControl.title: Cost Control
costControl.description: MONACAIR ensures you 100% total financial transparency. Its operation is based on cost pass-through – you receive a copy of each invoice for expenses related to your helicopter, with personalized reports according to your needs.
benefits: Tailor-made, priority service at the best rate
Access to exceptional insurance conditions thanks to its leading fleet in Europe

helicopterSales.title: Helicopter Purchase / Sales
helicopterSales.buyDescription: If you are planning to purchase a helicopter, MONACAIR accompanies you at every step of your process and helps you choose the aircraft perfectly adapted to your needs. Our experience of over 30 years and market expertise allow us to optimize your purchase process, by handling market research, offer selection and negotiation to guarantee you a helicopter equipped with all essential options.
helicopterSales.inspectionDescription: As part of our service, we perform pre-purchase controls and inspections for helicopters from brands such as Airbus Helicopter, Bell, Robinson, Guimbal... to ensure the quality of each aircraft. We negotiate the best purchase conditions for you and offer you meticulous follow-up, guaranteeing a helicopter that meets your expectations.
helicopterSales.sellDescription: Finally, our trading activity includes aircraft sales. If you are considering selling your helicopter, do not hesitate to contact us to benefit from our complete support and expertise to achieve a sale under the best conditions.

crewManagement.title: Crew Management
crewManagement.description: We offer complete after-sales service, by recruiting a dedicated crew, trained and certified in our academy. We can also save you recruitment costs by offering the provision of our crews.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: We also ensure the maintenance of your aircraft in our hangars, to guarantee that it is always ready to take off safely and reliably.
maintenance.certificationDescription: MONACAIR offers helicopter maintenance services within our subsidiary, Rotor Team, EASA 145 certified (No. FR.145.0517).
maintenance.locationsDescription: Our facilities and workshops located in Grimaud, Saint-Tropez and Cannes, as well as in Annecy and Courchevel, offer you the flexibility you can expect.

charter.title: Charter
charter.description: If you wish to make your investment profitable, we also offer you the possibility to manage the commercialization of your helicopter. We operate private flights year-round in Southern France and the Alps, allowing you to benefit from our client portfolio of the Alliance Monacair Blade Heli Sécurité.

ctaSection.title: Interested in Our Management Service?
ctaSection.description: Contact our team to discover how our management services can save you time and money.

privacyPolicy.title: MONACAIR Privacy Policy

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: This Privacy Policy aims to inform users of the website www.monacair.mc about how MONACAIR S.A.M. collects, uses, stores, and protects their personal data.
introduction.rgpd: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) No. 2016/679
introduction.monaco: Monégasque legislation on the protection of personal information (Law No. 1.165 as amended)
introduction.important: Important: By using the site, the user accepts this policy.

dataController.title: Data Controller Identity
dataController.address: Registered office: Monaco Heliport, Avenue des Ligures, 98000 Monaco

dataCollected.title: Data Collected
dataCollected.directDataTitle: Data provided directly by the user
dataCollected.directData7: Any other information communicated via our contact or booking forms
dataCollected.automaticData2: Navigation data (pages visited, connection time, browser type)

purposes.title: Collection Purposes
purposes.purpose1: Booking management and execution of transport contracts
purposes.purpose2: Customer communication (confirmation, flight tracking, practical information)
purposes.purpose3: Customer service management and request processing
purposes.purpose4: Sending commercial offers (subject to prior consent)
purposes.purpose5: User behavior analysis to improve services
purposes.purpose6: Compliance with legal and regulatory obligations

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.basis3: Consent (particularly for cookies or sending commercial offers)

recipients.title: Data Recipients
recipients.partnersDescription: Partner service providers necessary for proper service execution:
recipients.commitment: We commit to never sell your data to third parties.

security.title: Data Security
security.description: MONACAIR implements appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against:

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: In accordance with applicable legislation, you have the following rights:
rights.right1: Right of access to your data
rights.right2: Right to rectification of inaccurate data
rights.right4: Right to object to processing (particularly for commercial prospecting)
rights.recourseDescription: You have the possibility to file a complaint with the Commission for the Control of Personal Information (CCIN) of Monaco.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.type1: Cookies strictly necessary for site functionality
cookies.type2: Audience measurement cookies (Google Analytics or other)
cookies.managementDescription: A banner allows you to manage your preferences during your first visit.
cookies.moreInfo: For more information: consult our Cookie Policy.

modifications.title: Policy Modifications
modifications.description: MONACAIR reserves the right to modify this Policy at any time. Any substantial modification will be notified to you via the site.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For any questions regarding this Policy or the exercise of your rights

privacyPolicy.footer: This privacy policy guarantees the protection of your personal data in compliance with applicable legislation.

publisher.title: Site Publisher
publisher.address: Registered office: Monaco Heliport, Avenue des Ligures, 98000 Monaco
publisher.director: Publication Director: Ms. Elodie Mekhmoukh as Marketing Director

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: All content present on the website www.monacair.mc, including, but not limited to, texts, images, graphics, logo, icons, sounds, software, are protected by applicable intellectual property laws and are the exclusive property of MONACAIR or its partners.
intellectualProperty.prohibition: Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, adaptation of all or part of the site elements, regardless of the means or process used, is prohibited, except with prior written authorization from MONACAIR.

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.introduction: In accordance with applicable regulations (notably the General Data Protection Regulation - GDPR - and applicable Monégasque legislation), MONACAIR is committed to guaranteeing the confidentiality and security of your personal data.
personalData.purposes: Data collected on the site is used primarily for booking management, customer follow-up, commercial communications, and service improvement.
personalData.rights: You have the right to access, rectify, delete, limit processing, object, and port your data. To exercise these rights, please contact us at dpo@monacair.mc.
personalData.cookies: The site uses cookies for functionality, statistics, and user experience improvement purposes. You can manage your preferences via the cookie management banner.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.disclaimer: MONACAIR makes every effort to ensure the accuracy and updating of information published on its site. However, it cannot be held responsible for omissions, inaccuracies, or deficiencies in updating.
responsibility.userResponsibility: The user acknowledges using the site information under their exclusive responsibility.

hyperlinks.title: Hyperlinks
hyperlinks.description: The site may contain links to other sites. MONACAIR disclaims any responsibility regarding the content, privacy policy, or practices of these third-party sites.

applicableLaw.title: Applicable Law
applicableLaw.description: These legal mentions are governed by Monégasque laws. In case of dispute, Monaco courts will have sole jurisdiction.

whatIsCookie.title: What is a cookie?
whatIsCookie.description: A cookie is a small text file placed on the user's device (computer, tablet, smartphone) when visiting a website. It allows, among other things, to store information concerning navigation and user preferences.

purposes.title: Purpose of cookies used
purposes.description: The website www.monacair.mc uses different types of cookies for the following purposes:

necessary.title: Strictly necessary cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of the site (e.g., memorizing language choices, access to secure areas). They do not require user consent.

analytics.title: Audience measurement cookies (statistics)
analytics.description: These cookies allow us to analyze site traffic and usage (pages visited, time spent, geographical origin) to improve user experience. We notably use services such as Google Analytics. These cookies are subject to your prior consent.

advertising.title: Advertising and personalization cookies
advertising.description: These cookies are used to offer you advertisements tailored to your interests, on our site or on third-party sites. They require your explicit consent.

management.title: Cookie Management
management.bannerDescription: During your first visit to monacair.mc, a banner informs you about cookie usage and allows you to:
management.modifyPreferences: At any time, you can modify your preferences by clicking on the "Manage my cookies" link located at the bottom of the page.
management.browserConfig: You can also configure your browser to refuse certain cookies:
management.warning: Warning: blocking certain cookies may affect your user experience.

retention.title: Cookie retention period
retention.description: Cookies placed on your device are kept for a maximum period of 13 months from their placement. Beyond this period, consent will be requested again.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For any questions regarding this policy or cookie usage:
